title: In tha Hizzy Gizzy Galizzy
author: VD
content_html:
I’m quite pleased to announce that barring a shoddy execution of the idea, my concept for an article in the upcoming Smart Pop book on Douglas Adams has been accepted and will be appearing in it. Now, of course, I still have to actually write the thing, but that shouldn’t be too bad since I’ll probably be pressed right up against the word limit simply illustrating the point, so rife with examples are the texts.

Even better, I’m not the only one associated with this blog who will be contributing to the book… and no, Nate is not writing an article explaining that the Vogons are nothing but a metaphor for damn Yankees who ruin everything and started the war besides. At least not that I know of.

I’m quite pleased to announce that barring a shoddy execution of the idea, my concept for an article in the upcoming Smart Pop book on Douglas Adams has been accepted and will be appearing in it.  Now, of course, I still have to actually write the thing, but that shouldn’t be too bad since I’ll probably be pressed right up against the word limit simply illustrating the point, so rife with examples are the texts.
Even better, I’m not the only one associated with this blog who will be contributing to the book… and no, Nate is not writing an article explaining that the Vogons are nothing but a metaphor for damn Yankees who ruin everything and started the war besides.  At least not that I know of.
